code: import{useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function RegisterPage(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');async function registerUser(ev){ev.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('/register',{name,email,password});alert('Registration Completed');}catch(error){alert('registration failed');console.log(error);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4 grow flex items-center justify-around",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-64",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl text-center",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"",className:"max-w-md mx-auto",onSubmit:registerUser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"John Doe",value:name,onChange:event=>setName(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"your@emailid",value:email,onChange:event=>setEmail(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"password",value:password,onChange:event=>setPassword(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center py-2 text-gray-500",children:["Already Registered?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/login',className:"underline text-black",children:"Login"})]})]})]})});}
